body_html: @gunan Sounds good! Yeah I'm not using the pip packages at all so I can't really say anything about them. One minor thing to point out would be to maybe add a note on the "Compiling from Sources" section of the documentation, for people to use that flag when running the bazel build command. I think we could even just add the compiler option in the bazel build files themselves so developers don't have to worry about it.

body: @gunan Sounds good! Yeah I'm not using the pip packages at all so I can't really say anything about them. One minor thing to point out would be to maybe add a note on the "Compiling from Sources" section of the documentation, for people to use that flag when running the bazel build command. I think we could even just add the compiler option in the bazel build files themselves so developers don't have to worry about it.
